title: Do all of league a favor and fucking learn how to play before you even look at ranked.
body:
HOLY SHIT the teams today have been trash.

Ive played 5 ranked games today, i won fucking 2 of them, and if you check the match history for the games, in none of them was i the reason we lost (infact its usually bloody obvious who the retard in those games was)

Every single game ive played superbly for my elo, hit all the objectives at all the right times etc etc.

But theres always atleast one absolute fucking retard that manages to bring the entire team down to his level.

Like fuck the number of times ive had to explain to these shit%%%%s what a minimap is for today is mind blowing.

Like i dont want fucking hand outs, im more than happy to fucking crawl my way up to higher elos.

But for the love of fucking god if i can go fucking 11/3 with nearly 300 fucking farm and the enemy team is still fed enough to fucking drop me to 11/6 and lose the game.

Something is fucking wrong with that team.

Like holy shit is the mmr system just fucking nonexistent all of a sudden?

Like why the fuck am i playing in games with players with 5 mmr.

Well ok they arent 5 mmr but they sure as fuck feel like it.

Every fucking day when i lose a game i can literally go over the replays and find exactly which shit %%%% made me lose, and the funny thing i find is. even though yes i do lose games from my own fuck ups, im not perfect, its very fucking rare.

Which should statistically mean i should win most of my games but wiat i forgot, im not playing all fucking 5 members of my team at once.

Like shit man how fucking mentally disabled are these bronze 5 players this season, ive played almost 300 games this season and only just now am i getting out of b5 and its not even because i improved.

its because i got fucking fed up and decided to just grab four random fucktards who dont feed and queue with them.

And even then im still fucking carrying them, but atleast they arent fucking unwinnable like half these fuckheads are.

There really needs to be a fucking individual performance metric or the like, because there is way too many fucking example of players like myself who can easily sit down, and be the deciding factor in a game, that are stuck in b5 not because we arent good enough, because we arent good enough to load up five copies of league grow 4 more pairs of arms and play all 5 clients at once.

And the really fucking bad part is, the reason i lose for the most part when its my fault? tends to be in the games after playing with one of these shitheads, not because im an angry person, on the contrary im the nicest calmest %%%% you will ever meet.

Because fucking retards PISS ME THE FUCK OFF.

Like i really do believe we should omit a few warning labels here and there so they will just cull themselves.

Because they are holding back the entire human race, not just my solo queue.

replies.body: I went from having a 90% win rate to having a 30% win rate in less then 2 days. i had afks to feeders and it was impossible to carry the 0/10 teams i got every game.

I know the feel, 80% winrate b1 90lp to b3 60% in one day, from there it was all downhill as id crossed the threshold from "shit teams that i can atleast tolerate" to "shit teams that send me into a blind rage"

I mean if you want a true testament to how much tilt affects my play, take a look at my veigar, its a 100% winrate, in the support lane no less, and in every single game i match our most fed player for kill participations, while maintaining most wards and stuff like that.

Why? because veigar is so hilariously easy to play its impossible to get tilted.

Make a fresh account and level it up to 30. Then start ranked and see where you end up. It's definitely going to be faster than you climbing out of Bronze 5 at the rate that you're making it out to be.

EDIT: Turned out someone necro'd this really old post...and I didn't realise smh
Legit everyone on here has had enough of your whinging just get over it already jesus
